location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

properties.Description: The properties of a Test Base Account resource.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

sku.Description: Describes a Test Base Account SKU.

accessLevel.Description: The access level of the Test Base Account.

resourceType.Description: The type of resource the SKU applies to.

name.Description: The name of the SKU. This is typically a letter + number code, such as B0 or S0.

tier.Description: The tier of this particular SKU.

locations.Description: The locations that the SKU is available.

name.Description: An invariant to describe the feature, such as 'SLA'.

value.Description: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity, such as 99.9%.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

properties.Description: The properties of the Test Base Package.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

testTypes.Description: OOB, functional or both. Mapped to the data in 'tests' property.

targetOSList.Description: Specifies the target OSs of specific OS Update types.

lastModifiedTime.Description: The UTC timestamp when the package was last modified.

flightingRing.Description: The flighting ring for feature update.

isEnabled.Description: Flag showing that whether the package is enabled. It doesn't schedule test for package which is not enabled.

blobPath.Description: The file path of the package.

validationResults.Description: The validation results. There's validation on package when it's created or updated.

osUpdateType.Description: Specifies the OS update type to test against, e.g., 'Security updates' or 'Feature updates'.

targetOSs.Description: Specifies the target OSs to be tested.

isValid.Description: Indicates whether the package passed the validation.

validationRunStatus.Description: The status of the validation run of the package.

isActive.Description: Indicates if this test is active.It doesn't schedule test for not active Test.

commands.Description: The commands used in the test.

content.Description: The content of the command. The content depends on source type.

runElevated.Description: Specifies whether to run the command as administrator.

restartAfter.Description: Specifies whether to restart the VM after the command executed.

maxRunTime.Description: Specifies the max run time of the command.

runAsInteractive.Description: Specifies whether to run the command in interactive mode.

alwaysRun.Description: Specifies whether to run the command even if a previous command is failed.

applyUpdateBefore.Description: Specifies whether to apply update before the command.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

properties.Description: Properties of a favorite process identifier.

actualProcessName.Description: The actual name of the favorite process. It will be equal to resource name except for the scenario that the process name contains characters that are not allowed in the resource name.
